p: Quantification by mass spectrometry confirmed the abundance of flavonol derivatives in both extracts ( Table 3, Figure S3). Interestingly, we found three times more quercetin-3- O-rutinoside and quercetin-3- O-galactoside in the acetonic than in the aqueous extract, and five times more kaempferol-hexoxides in the acetonic than in the aqueous extract. These results confirmed the presence of notable amounts of flavonoids in both A. borbonica extracts.
